comments.comment: Manussayek jeewath wela innakan witharai hema dema karanne marunama karanna bahane . Marena eka kohe hitiyath marenawa . Eka e minihage welawa . Nathuwa wahana hadana eke warada newei. Minissunge salli ohoma winasa karanna epa . Mehema bus ekak hadanna podi ganakin be . Loku salliyak yanawa . E nisa puluwannam chance ekak denna podi miniha gena hithala.neethiyatama hema dema karanna epa pau minissu . Meken yapena minissu kee denek innawada . Stiker karana aya wagema mewa karala jeewath wana minissu anathai . Podi minihage badata thamai para wadinne . Rajaye job hama minihatama ne . Therenawanm mole thiyena kenek therum ganna . Bs.
comments.author: Randula Malshan

comments.comment: Horn eka nm galeuwata kamak ne . Stiker galawanawa kiyanne hithata amarui .mokada minissu amaruwen hamba karana salli wiyadam karalai hadanne . Horakam karana minihata bus oni ne .u hemadama horakam karai . Priwet bus duwana eka amaruwen gemak gahanne . Rajaye dewal walata kisima deyak ne . Pau neda podi miniha . E genath tikak hithanna ihala baladharin innawa nm
